title: PSA: There’s a ‘New iCloud Terms & Conditions’ bug on the Mac – and you can’t do anything about it
content:
For the past few weeks, some users have been complaining about a “New iCloud Terms & Condition” bug that needs you to accept iCloud’s terms and conditions over and over again.

more…

The post PSA: There’s a ‘New iCloud Terms & Conditions’ bug on the Mac – and you can’t do anything about it appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Users have been complaining about a "New iCloud Terms & Condition" bug that needs you to accept the terms over and over again.
